DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate acute chronic effect whole-body vibration exercise serum insulin-like growth factor-1 level woman fibromyalgia ( FM ) . It hypothesize woman FM would exhibit increase IGF-1 follow acute chronic WBV . Twenty-four woman FM randomize two group : Vibration Group ( VG ) Control Group ( CG ) . The VG underwent protocol WBV exercise twice week total six week , whereas CG perform protocol without vibratory stimulus . Both group continue usual pharmacological treatment . Serum IGF-1 level determine use Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay ( ELISA ) . To test effect chronic WBV , serum IGF-1 measurement take baseline week 1,3 , 6 intervention . To test effect acute WBV , within week 1 , serum IGF-1 measurement take immediately follow session WBV .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Whole-Body Vibration Exercise Serum IGF-1 Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose fibromyalgia accord American College Rheumatology criterion least three year . Orthopedic limitation , cardiovascular , pulmonary , metabolic disease would preclude exercise . Participation study .
